Key Match Events: Sacramento Kings rally from 15-point deficit to win the game with a late putback by Domantas Sabonis
Pre-Game Insights: Heat were without Kevin Love due to personal matter and Jaime Jaquez Jr. due to illness
Kings were without Kevin Huerter due to illness
Post-Match Reflections: Kings improved to 6-31 all-time at Miami
Heat struggled from the free throw line in the fourth quarter
Miscellaneous Highlights: Game was played at MIA's current home arena where they've been outscored by 20+ points in third quarters eight times
This was not a historical comparison or unique statistical aspect
